2.caption_en:
A white wrench and screwdriver crossed on a teal background, depicted as a flat silhouette icon representing tools, repair, or settings.

{"artifact_type":"icon","description":"Flat silhouette icon of a crossed wrench and screwdriver","objects":[{"name":"wrench","color":"white","shape":"silhouette","position":"center-left","orientation":"diagonal top-left to bottom-right"},{"name":"screwdriver","color":"white","shape":"silhouette","position":"center-right","orientation":"diagonal bottom-left to top-right"}],"background_color":"teal (cyan)","style":"flat, minimalistic","probable_meanings":["tools","repair","maintenance","settings"],"confidence":0.92}

4.caption_en:
Slide titled "Advanced Tools (€)" displaying platform architecture and dashboard visuals on the left with vendor logos on the right (AWS, fastbreak.one, Miro), indicating tooling and infrastructure options powered by AWS.

{
  "artifact_type": "slide",
  "title": "Advanced Tools (€)",
  "layout": "two-column",
  "primary_text": "Advanced Tools (€)",
  "language": "English",
  "currency": "EUR",
  "purpose": "Presentation of advanced tooling and platform architecture partners for IT infrastructure",
  "visual_elements": [
    {
      "kind": "icon",
      "name": "wrench/tools",
      "position": "top-left",
      "color": "teal"
    },
    {
      "kind": "image",
      "name": "dashboard_screenshot",
      "alt": "financial dashboard with charts and pie chart",
      "position": "left-column",
      "size": "medium"
    },
    {
      "kind": "image",
      "name": "platform_architecture_framework",
      "alt": "Platform Architecture Framework diagram and AWS Well-Architected reference",
      "position": "left-column",
      "size": "large"
    },
    {
      "kind": "logo",
      "name": "aws",
      "alt": "AWS logo (orange smile)",
      "position": "right-column-top",
      "size": "large",
      "notes": "Also shown as 'Powered by AWS' elsewhere on the slide"
    },
    {
      "kind": "logo",
      "name": "fastbreak.one",
      "alt": "fastbreak.one logo",
      "position": "right-column-middle",
      "size": "medium"
    },
    {
      "kind": "logo",
      "name": "miro",
      "alt": "Miro logo (yellow square with stylized M)",
      "position": "right-column-bottom",
      "size": "medium"
    },
    {
      "kind": "logo",
      "name": "platform_innovation_kit",
      "alt": "Platform Innovation Kit mark",
      "position": "bottom-left",
      "size": "small"
    },
    {
      "kind": "text",
      "content": "The Platform Architecture Framework provides guidance to select and build the right IT infrastructure",
      "position": "center-left",
      "size": "small"
    },
    {
      "kind": "text",
      "content": "POWERED BY AWS",
      "position": "lower-left",
      "size": "small"
    }
  ],
  "colors": [
    "teal",
    "#f2f2f2",
    "navy",
    "#ff9900"
  ],
  "notes": "Slide emphasizes vendor tooling and architecture guidance; visual focus is on left-side diagrams and right-side vendor logos."
}

5.caption_en:
Caption:
A dark-blue financial dashboard shows charts including a "Use of Funds - Months 0-18" pie chart, a "Monthly Revenue vs Expenses | 5-Year Projection" bar chart, and a "Cash in the Bank | 5-Year Projection" chart, with a "Capital Required" box showing $790,082 and "Months to reach profitability" as 50; the right side is partially overlaid by a slide titled "The Platform Architecture" and "PLATFORM VALUE STACK."

JSON:
{
  "artifact_type": "screenshot_dashboard_with_overlay",
  "detected_text": [
    "Use of Funds - Months 0-18",
    "Capital Required",
    "$790,082",
    "Months to reach profitability",
    "50",
    "Monthly Revenue vs Expenses | 5-Year Projection",
    "Cash in the Bank | 5-Year Projection",
    "The Platform Architectur",
    "guidance to select and b",
    "PLATFORM",
    "PLATFORM VALUE STACK",
    "Value Layers"
  ],
  "major_elements": [
    {
      "type": "info_box",
      "label": "Capital Required",
      "value": 790082,
      "value_currency": "USD",
      "additional_label": "Months to reach profitability",
      "additional_value": 50
    },
    {
      "type": "pie_chart",
      "title": "Use of Funds - Months 0-18",
      "visible_segments": [
        "Growth",
        "Other",
        "R&D",
        "Ops"
      ]
    },
    {
      "type": "bar_chart",
      "title": "Monthly Revenue vs Expenses | 5-Year Projection",
      "series_examples": [
        "CAPEX",
        "SG&A",
        "COGS",
        "Revenue"
      ]
    },
    {
      "type": "line_chart",
      "title": "Cash in the Bank | 5-Year Projection"
    },
    {
      "type": "overlay_slide",
      "title_approx": "The Platform Architecture",
      "subtitle_approx": "PLATFORM VALUE STACK",
      "occludes_right_side": true
    }
  ],
  "visual_attributes": {
    "dominant_background_color": "navy_blue",
    "layout": "left-aligned dashboard with right-side overlay",
    "readability": "partial occlusion on right; most left elements legible"
  },
  "notes": "Right portion of the dashboard is covered by an overlaid slide about platform architecture, partially hiding some chart details."
}
